Description: Welcome to Chestnut Village, this bright and sunny top level unit is steps from the Brookline and Newton lines. This condo has two good size bedrooms with ample closet space, private balcony, new floors, and updated kitchen with a considerable amount of cabinet space. Plenty of amenities included in your rent, such as, heat and hot water, two dedicated parking spaces, tennis courts, pool and in building laundry. This great location offers quick access to Boston College, Wegman's, The Street, and The Mall @ Chestnut Hill, including many great restaurant options. Close to public transportation, including Green Line Station 1.8 miles away. Tenants to pay First, Security, and 1/2 month's Broker fee.
